sentence.Network_en: Our yacht was well equipped with two double cabins fore and aft.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的游艇设施完备，首尾有两个双人舱。

sentence.Network_en: He loosened his very strong hold on the ship's rail and glanced fore and aft.
sentence.Network_cn: 他松开紧紧抓住护栏的手，往船的两头扫了一眼。

sentence.Network_en: She came alongside and raked him fore and aft.
sentence.Network_cn: 她倒对他展开近战,全面开火.
